content.text: Yes, I love music! I bond with my brother over music and we go to concerts together. What about you?
I love music too! I went to see Justin Timberlake in concert for my last birthday. He's one of my favorite artists.
Oh cool! I've always wanted to see Justin Timberlake in concert. I'm a big fan of his music.
Yeah, his music is great! I love his songs "Can't Stop the Feeling" and "Mirrors."
Me too! Those are two of my favorite songs of his.
What other artists do you like?
I like a lot of different artists, but some of my favorites are Taylor Swift, Ed Sheeran, and Maroon 5.
Oh cool! I like all of those artists too. I'm a big fan of Taylor Swift.
Me too! She's an amazing artist.
Do you go to a lot of concerts?
Not as many as I would like to, but I try to go to a few a year.
Me too. I wish I could go to more concerts, but they can be expensive.
Yeah, they can be. But they're always worth it!
I agree! They're so much fun!
